criteria.name: Design/Usability
criteria.rubric:
How usable is the design?
Is it ready to ship?
If you had no context about the project, would you know what to do?

criteria.name: Presentation
criteria.rubric:
How was the demo?
Did everything go to plan?
How do you feel about the project as a whole based solely on the presentation they gave.

criteria.name: Technical Depth
criteria.rubric:
How complex is the code?
How much of the project depends on the backend code?
Did the project use cool technologies?
Did the project use all the features of a library?

criteria.name: Novelty
criteria.rubric:
How novel is the idea?
Did you already see something like this today?
Has it been done before?
Is this idea cute or unique?

criteria.name: Task Simplicity
criteria.rubric: How simple was the original task?

criteria.name: Project Complexity
criteria.rubric:
How many steps did the project use to accomplish the task?
The score is subjective, not an actual defined number.

criteria.name: Overall Execution
criteria.rubric: How well did the project accomplish the task?

criteria.name: Library Usage
criteria.rubric:
Did the project use a lot of libraries?
1: The project used many libraries.
10: The project used no libraries.

criteria.name: Overall Design Score
criteria.rubric:
Subjectively, how pretty is the project?
How easy is it to use?

criteria.name: Filesize
criteria.rubric:
How big is the actual project?
1: The project is huge!
10: The project is a couple bytes.
